name: tertium-js-snippets
description: JavaScript Snippets for Visual Studio Code

scripts.changelog: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git add --all && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md"
scripts.pre:release: npm run md && npm run changelog
scripts.release:patch: npm run pre:release && git checkout main && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && git checkout develop && git rebase main && git push -f && git checkout main
scripts.release:minor: npm run pre:release && git checkout develop && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push
scripts.release:major: npm run pre:release && git checkout develop && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push
